website_summaries.verdict: An excellent machine with a drawback (requires manufacturer skewer) that will be limiting for some consumers.
pros: Smooth feedback and a "real road" feel
cons: Owners must use the factory-provided skewer
Fixing method for skewer does not work with all bikes

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little bit of a cheapskate so it wasn't easy for me to "pull the trigger" on this purchase. So far, though, I'm really glad that I did. This thing just reeks quality. It is super-quiet and the ride feel is remarkably like being on the road. I haven't had it long enough to evaluate durability but by the build quality and the lifetime warranty (to the original purchaser) I'm pretty confident that it will last and last. I'm really happy that I decided to spend the extra $$ for a quality trainer. Sometimes, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We love our bike trainer. It provides the exact resistance we need to casually ride indoors during off season months. It does create a little bit of wear on the tires (more than we expected) but still doesn't wear them as much as frequent outdoor use for 6+ months would do. Overall very happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Great Trainer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I coupled my Cannondale road bike with a Wahoo Speed and Cadence sensor, Bikemate slimcase for the iPhone, a Polar H7 heart monitor, and this Cascade Fluid Pro Trainer for the most complete cardio equipment set you could ask for -- all bought on Amazon. Add the iBiker app of the iPhone to collect the data. This trainer is superb. It really does feel like riding on the road, and is very stable. You can find spinning videos on YouTube to add your workout, or just watch whatever. I have been very pleasantly surprised by this piece of equipment and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MktingGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great for bad weather riding
customer_reviews.text: Here in the desert of Arizona I dreaded riding riding my bike in the summer. This worked great, is heavy duty and well worth the premium in price over other models. This is truly the Rolls Royce model.
customer_reviews.author: EJK-AZ

customer_reviews.title: I could not be more pleased; very high quality
customer_reviews.text: 1st off, Cascade is not a house-hold name in the cycle trainer community. I read the reviews and took a chance when purchasing. I could not be more pleased; very high quality, very easy to set up. Very happy with this trainer for the cold Colorado winters.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very stable and smooth performance. Look forward to many miles inside on this trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Justme

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding trainer. Easy to set up. Very smooth and realistic toad feel.
customer_reviews.author: daveb

customer_reviews.title: It works great, but it's just a little hard to hook ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great, but it's just a little hard to hook your bike up into the trainer just right. Wish they made it a little easier to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Doug  Miranda

customer_reviews.title: It switches between the three bikes I own very easily. I wish it has a way of tracking ...
customer_reviews.text: It switches between the three bikes I own very easily. I wish it has a way of tracking distance or watt output. Very quite. Quick and easy set-up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great workout!
customer_reviews.text: What a great trainer! We have used many large stationary bikes through the years. Most were very large and bulky with big flywheels, but were usually not the same feel as actually riding your bike. My husband commutes to work on his bike and after using this Fluid Pro trainer for 30 minutes, he bought a second one to use at our cabin during the winter months. He had never liked trainers before because of the "jerky" motion. This one is very smooth and lifelike. We both agree that this trainer has the feel of actually riding a bike. We now own two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Trainer
customer_reviews.text: I have been racing triathlon for 10+ years and 4 years at the profesional level. Over the years I have logged a significant amount of time on trainers and the Cascade Fluid Pro Trainer has the best feel of all. I use my trainer for very specific intensity workouts and the trainer provides a very real feel. The other benefit is the stability of the trainer base. Standing, sprinting or accelerating all feel great! I highly recommend this trainer to anyone that wants the real road feel indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Halpin

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, Strong, and Compact!
customer_reviews.text: The Cascade Fluid Pro is really nice. The one aspect that makes it better than a lot of other trainers is its fluidity. The back roller is extremely quiet, which means no more of that "whining" noise when you train indoors. The two orange legs on the front pop back, and the back roller moves forward, which allows for compact travel of the trainer! I really enjoy using the trainer; it's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleWA

product_meta.title: Cascade Health & Fitness Fluidpro Bike Trainer, Orange/Silver
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Cascade Fluid Pro provides riders with an incredible feel that will keep you training longer. The thermally sealed fluid drive will give you years of use with no risk of leaks. Our quick connect is a snap to use allowing for quick bike set up. The front riser offers you three separate height options.
feature_bullets: It's compact and light weight design offer incredible stability and reliability
